meanings: go out and sit in the open

vlive.korean: 자주 안 먹긴 한데 메로나? I don't eat it often but Melona? 듣기 View video NCT : 런쥔이왔어요!!
vlive.english: I don't eat it often but Melona?

vlive.korean: 라이브 인증이긴 한데 오늘 갑자기 이렇게 되니까 내가 당황스럽네~ It is proving this is live... But to make this happen today... I am embarrassed. 듣기 View video VICTON : 월요일밤!!병찬이랑
vlive.english: It is proving this is live... But to make this happen today... I am embarrassed.

vlive.korean: 그래야 될 것 같긴 한데... I think so too... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 수빈&휴닝카이 : 뚝딱뚝딱 공작시간
약간 흔들기는 너무 어중간 한데? It's kind of vague to shake them. 듣기 View video KIM JAEJOONG : [LIVE] 내일은 재중이와 콘서트에서 만나는 날💛
vlive.english: It's kind of vague to shake them.

vlive.korean: 좋긴 한데 전... I like it but... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 미리 크리스마스 모아

examples.korean: The land was enclosed in the seventeenth century. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 땅은 17세기에 사유화되었다. (영국에서 공유지를 울타리로 나눠 사유지 표시를 한 데서 비롯) Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The land was enclosed in the seventeenth century. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The officers were severely reprimanded for their unprofessional behaviour. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 경찰관들은 전문가답지 못한 행동을 한 데 대해 심한 질책을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The officers were severely reprimanded for their unprofessional behaviour. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: As a place to live, Oxford takes some beating. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 살기 위한 곳으로는 옥스퍼드만한 데가 잘 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: As a place to live, Oxford takes some beating. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I think she’ll agree to do it but in any event, all she can say is ‘no’. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내 생각에는 그녀가 그것을 하겠다고 할 것 같긴 한데 아무튼 그녀는 ‘싫다’는 말밖에 할 줄을 몰라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I think she’ll agree to do it but in any event, all she can say is ‘no’. Add to Wordbook
